description.value:
When you find a glaring weakness, you can set your allies up to annihilate your foe.

When you use @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Shared Stratagem]{Shared Stratagem}, you can designate up to 10 allies instead of just one. The foe is @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} against the first attack from each designated ally before your next turn, and each ally's first attack deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to the target if it hits.

@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feat-effects.Effect: Didactic Strike]{Effect: Didactic Strike}
